title: TheDungeons
description: A custom dungeon with multiple functionality. Monsters, access levels and much more! [1.17-1.21.x]
body:
![Overview Image](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/d79d223d1cc001201e1ac4a0b28bcc2fc547713c.png)

[Discord](https://discord.gg/xRfE5dkmYX) | [Documentation](https://github.com/getplusm/Dungeons/wiki) | [Donate](https://boosty.to/p1azmer)

**With Dungeons, you can create unique and random dungeons for your players using spawn, commands, and effects, as well as other configurations.**

---

![Requirements Image](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/897fa2e662a207ad66da129d9504a95bafba7efa.png)

- **Spigot 1.20+**
- **Java 17+**
- [PLAZMER-ENGINE](https://github.com/getplusm/Engine)
- [WorldEdit](https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/worldedit/files) or [FAWE](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/fastasyncworldedit.13932/)
---

![Dependencies Image](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/b6856f540de4b4cac918f53326712da0be087b3b.png)

- [HolographicDisplays](https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/holographic-displays/files), [DecentHolograms](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/decentholograms-1-8-1-20-1-papi-support-no-dependencies.96927/) & Fancy
- ItemsAdder & MMOItems
- GriefPrevention, KingdomX, GriefDefender & WorldGuard
- MythicMobs and others with commands module
- PartyAndFriends & Parties (Dungeon party access)
- Skills (Dungeon Access)

---

![Features Image](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/60144e4de3ed3aca170e1016d535d91b2da59207.png)

### Party System
- Supports third-party party systems for group entry.

### Commands
- Add unlimited commands for dungeon stages: Open and Close.

### Custom Mobs
- Customize mobs with potions, equipment, names, and rewards.

### Chest Items
- Define multiple chest rewards with NBT support.

### Effects
- Apply effects to players within a 15-block radius.

### Access Keys
- Create keys for dungeon access.

### Custom Blocks
- Designate any block as a chest using the config or `/dungeon editor`.

### Opening Types
- **Click**: Players open the chest.
- **Timer**: Dungeon opens automatically after a delay.

### Multi-World Support
- Create dungeons for any world.

### Fully Customizable Text
- Customize texts, holograms, and menus in the `/lang/` folder.

### Infinite Schematics
- Use multiple dungeon schematics with customizable selection methods.

### Region Settings
- Configure dungeon regions with custom names or disable them.

### Timer Settings
- Customize refresh, wait, open, and close times.

---

[SETUP GUIDE](https://github.com/getplusm/Dungeons/wiki)

**Need help? Join our Discord:** [Discord](https://discord.gg/xRfE5dkmYX)
